content: I have had the pleasure of working with John on several commercial and residential projects since 2002, the most recent being a large glass balcony for my own home.
John has been preparing estimates for my company for more than thirty years with a good level of success. They are produced on time and accurately; I know I can rely on his service with confidence.
John’s professionalism not only leads to a smooth and stress-free build but also makes him one of the most pleasant individuals I have ever worked with.

John has the added ability to produce planning drawings and building regulation details for my clients when necessary and deals with preparing risk assessments and method statements when I need them. He is a great all round professional.

John’s ability to coordinate with various tradespeople and effectively liaise with building control and council planning has been invaluable. I have personally recommended John to friends and family, all of whom share my appreciation for his talent in delivering projects on time and within budget.
